DOC.brief_summary: Intra-articular temporomandibular disorder often related pain area temporomandibular joint , ear temple . The aim study investigate efficiency anterior reposition splint management pain related temporomandibular joint disc displacement reduction .
DOC.brief_title: The Efficiency Anterior Repositioning Splint Management Temporomandibular Joint Dysunction
DOC.detailed_description: The research material consist 112 patient , age 24 45 year , gender , report treatment Consulting Room Temporomandibular Joint Dysfunctions Jagiellonian University Cracow , 2014-2016 , due pain click temporomandibular joint comorbid hypertension masticatory muscle . Subjects examine accord Diagnostic Criteria Temporomandibular Disorders protocol inclusion painful disc displacement reduction masticatory muscle contracture assign randomly study control group ( 56 patient ) . In study group use anterior reposition splint low arch 20 hour usage per 4 month . In control group non-invasive therapy apply use biostimulation laser form 12 session , perform every second day , area temporomandibular joint open mouth perform muscle self-exercises dominant protrusive position mandible . Pain intensity evaluate use verbal numerical rating scale ( VNRS ) immediately treatment 4 16 week . The obtain data analyze use U Mann-Whitney test ( p â‰¤ 0,005 ) .
DOC.criteria: 1. unilateral bilateral presence clicking , pop and/or snap noise ( ) detect palpation open close lateral protrusive movement TMJ ( ) , 2. previous 30 day , TMJ noise ( ) present jaw movement function , 3. unilateral bilateral pain area temporomandibular joint , 4. presence masticatory muscle contracture , 5. full dentition single tooth loss , 6. good general health , 7. positive mandible protrusion test , 8. contraindication laser therapy 9. patient consent involve study . 1. partial tooth loss edentulism , 2. contraindication laser therapy 3. absence appropriate symptom 4. absence consent involve study
